fields.name: SITE_ID
fields.title: Site Identifier
fields.description: A unique identifier for each data collection site

fields.name: DESCRIPTION
fields.title: Site Description
fields.description: A descriptive name for the data collection site

fields.name: MONTHS
fields.title: Month
fields.description: Month data was collected in e.g. January

fields.name: YEARS
fields.title: Year
fields.description: Year data was collected in e.g. 2016

fields.name: HOURS
fields.title: Hour
fields.description: Hour data was collected in e.g. 0..23

fields.name: SATURDAY
fields.title: Saturday
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that was recorded on this day and time. Can be null if there is a error recording data.

fields.name: SUNDAY
fields.title: Sunday
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that was recorded on this day and time

fields.name: MONDAY
fields.title: Monday
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that was recorded on this day and time

fields.name: TUESDAY
fields.title: Tuesday
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that was recorded on this day and time

fields.name: WEDNESDAY
fields.title: Wednesday
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that was recorded on this day and time

fields.name: THURSDAY
fields.title: Thursday
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that was recorded on this day and time

fields.name: FRIDAY
fields.title: Friday
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that was recorded on this day and time
